Magic System

Holotech

Quick Facts

% of Magi
Non-magic alternative (Goldhelm exclusive initially)
Known Practitioners
king-aldric, princess-seraphina, kaboom, helm
Sub-types
Holo-Weaponry, Holo-Armor, Holo-Infrastructure, Holo-Medicine, Anti-Magic Suppression
  1. Home
  2. â€º
  3. Magic
  4. â€º
  5. Holotech

Holotech is not magic, which is precisely the point. The Goldhelm Kingdom developed holographic and electromagnetic technology specifically as a power system that magic cannot easily interact with, counter, or disrupt. Where malefici requires a living practitioner with a personal reservoir, and runestones require physical inscription, holotech requires engineering knowledge and manufacturable components â€” systems that can be replicated, distributed, trained on, and maintained without any connection to the magical substrate.

The original Goldhelm applications were military: weapons that bypass magical barriers because they operate via electromagnetic principles rather than magical force, armor systems that absorb magical energy input and redirect it as heat or electricity, and the Auric Vanguardâ€™s signature coordinated battle systems that function even when all magical ability among the troops is suppressed. The anti-magic design was total â€” Goldhelmâ€™s engineering principle was that a technology requiring magic to operate is a technology that a magic-suppression capability renders useless.

Fradaâ€™s adaptation after the Golden War changed the distribution of holotech capability fundamentally. The Goldhelm designs required specific manufacturing processes and materials; Fradaâ€™s engineers redesigned from observation to use more accessible components and less precise manufacturing tolerances, producing systems that were somewhat less capable than the originals but manufacturable at scale. The Holo-Tech Forge Docks in Hiypolis produce ships, weapons, and industrial equipment at a rate Goldhelmâ€™s workshops have never matched.

What Goldhelm retains is the highest-tier capability: the most advanced holotech designs, the manufacturing precision for applications Frada cannot replicate, and the foundational research pipeline that Princess Seraphinaâ€™s work demonstrates has not stagnated despite the Kingdomâ€™s isolation. The monopoly is broken; the lead is intact.
